import React from 'react' import { AiOutlineShoppingCart } from 'react-icons/ai'; import { MdDone } from 'react-icons/md'; import { MdClear } from 'react-icons/md'; import { AiOutlineInfoCircle } from 'react-icons/ai'; const Card = ({ data }) => { const [clicked, setCliked] = React.useState(false); return ( <> {data.map((card) => { const { id, product_name, img, price, product_description, stock } = card; return (

{product_name}

{price}

setCliked(!clicked)} className="buy">
alert("negro")}>
setCliked(!clicked)} className="remove">
{product_description &&
}

{product_description}

Disponibles:{stock}

); })} ) } export default Card
